short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domestic and International Corporate Investigations and Protection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intravaia Investigations offers private investigations, business intelligence services, & risk management to businesses based in Seattle, WA, throughout the U.S. and world. We specialize in work place violence, risk assessment, threat assessment, behavioral analysis, security consulting, incident resolution, coupled with specialized investigations.  We provide program development and training for hostile work environment, risk assessment, management and conflict resolution.  Our diverse group of men and women are all prior law enforcement officers and/or military personnel with extensive experience, and training.  They possess backgrounds with city, state, federal law enforcement agencies.  We are also an approved U.S. federal government, WA State, city and county contractor.  As of 08/05/14 we are being considered for a contract with U.S. Department of Energy National Nuclear Security Administration
